alert.note: Alert for Knox (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 01 at 4:23PM EST until January 01 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EST FOR SOUTHEASTERN LAUREL...NORTHWESTERN KNOX...SOUTHEASTERN OWSLEY AND CLAY COUNTIES... At 422 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Malcomb to near Ogle, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bear Branch. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EST for south central and southeastern Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
